mapper.sql: id,flow_id,node_id, e_key, name, order_index, type, event_type, content, create_code, create_name, version, ts
mapper.delete: delete from flow_node_event where id in #{it}
delete from flow_node_event where flow_id = #{flowId} and node_id=#{nodeId}
mapper.insert: insert into flow_node_event (id, e_key, name, flow_id,node_id, order_index, type, event_type, content, create_code, create_name, version, ts) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0,now())

insert into flow_node_event (id, e_key, name, flow_id,node_id, order_index, type, event_type, content, create_code, create_name, version, ts)
(#{it.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{it.key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.flowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{it.nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{it.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.createCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0,now())

insert into flow_node_event
id, flow_Id, node_id, e_key, name, order_index, type, event_type, content, create_code, create_name, version, ts,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, now()
mapper.update: update flow_node_event set e_key = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_id = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_index = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_type = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_code = #{createCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = version+1, ts = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
